participant_1.background:
I will probably focus more on my football career to get my mind off of the breakup.
i m in my last year of grad school.
i have male pattern baldness.
My favorite way to celebrate is to blast music in my car and dance around.
my favorite movie is 16 candles.

participant_2.background:
My daily routine consists of working from home as a digital artist and spending weekends with my girlfriend in Salt Lake City.
I enjoy driving my classic car along the winding roads near my lake house.
I'm happy about my new sweater, but I'm also disappointed about not getting into the gifted program.
I think about the lyrics of my favorite rock songs as I walk.
i helped develop facebook.

content.text: Hey! I'm not doing so well today. My girlfriend broke up with me. Can you talk to me and make me feel better?
Sure, that's okay. Do you want to tell me more about it?
Yeah, it's been a long time coming. I know I need to focus more on my football career and she was holding me back. But I'm still sad about it.
I can understand that. It's always hard to lose someone you care about. But it sounds like you're making the right decision for yourself. And you have plenty of time to find someone else.
Thanks, I appreciate that. I know I'm going to be okay. I just need a little time to get over it.
Take all the time you need. And if you need someone to talk to, I'm always here for you.
No problem. Now, what do you want to do for the rest of the day?
I'm not sure. Maybe I'll go for a walk or watch some TV.
That sounds like a good idea. I'm going to go back to work. But I'll be thinking of you.
